---
name: Feature request
about: Suggest a new feature or enhancement
labels: ["enhancement"]
---

## Summary

One-sentence description of the feature or change.

## Problem

What problem does this solve? When do you run into it today?

## Proposed solution

How you’d like this to work. Include example CLI commands, API usage, or UX flow if relevant.

## Alternatives

Other approaches you’ve considered and why they’re not ideal.

## Additional context

Links, prior art, mockups, or any extra context that helps us understand the request.
